parameter.name: perPage
parameter.description: Limit the number of article results per page.

parameter.name: text
parameter.description: Search terms. Can be any text and will search across subject, body_text, keywords, question, answer.

parameter.name: topicIds
parameter.description: Comma separated list of topic IDs to filter results. Get the list of IDs from the /topics endpoint.

parameter.name: brandIds
parameter.description: Comma separated list of brand IDs to filter results. Get the list of IDs from the /brands endpoint.

parameter.name: inSupportCenter
parameter.description: Boolean parameter to limit search to articles that appear in support center defaults to all articles.

parameter.name: sortField
parameter.description: Article field on which would like to sort.

parameter.name: sortDirection
parameter.description: Direction to sort 'asc' for ascending and 'desc' for descending.

parameter.name: acceptLanguage
parameter.description: Show only articles with ISO language code. Also translate the subject and body fields to the given language.
